review_data.title: Good halal food
review_data.content: Nice Moroccan restaurant in Zurich, near FIFA museum/Enge station. Nice environment, food was good-ish. I ordered a lamb couscous and found the meat a bit dry. My friend ordered a tagine and that was better.
